strapiEvent.name: Family Day: The Art of Food
strapiEvent.organization: Crystal Bridges Museum of American Art
strapiEvent.description:
Enjoy a day with the whole family and unleash your creativity with food-inspired artmaking at Crystal Bridges during the Family Day: The Art of Food event this Sunday, Jul 23, from 10a-3p.

  • Guac This Way: Family Day will kick off with an exciting Guac Off sponsored by Avocados from Peru. Local media personalities will prepare guacamole for a panel of celebrity chefs for a chance to be named the Guac Off Champion and win the coveted silver avocado.
  • Family Fun: Enjoy a live performance by beloved children's artist Hot Toast, grab lunch from local food trucks, and cool down with refreshing lemonade provided by Raising Cane's on Walker Landing.

The event is free, but guests can bring a non-perishable food item to donate to local food bank partners! Learn more HERE.
